name: fusely - free landing page
description:
Trouble-free landing page created for prospective junior frontend developers who may need a well-prepared design (well, I hope so 🤣) that allows them to practice their skills.


Figma structure:

  • 🚀Getting Started - an intro page.
  • ⚙️ Style Guide - a specification for reusable elements of the design.
  • 🎨 Design - the actual design available on three different screens: desktop, tablet, and mobile.
  • ✨ Extras - additional stuff like a dark theme, a single blog post page, or a slider.
  • 🌁 Cover Image - just a thumbnail for the Figma app. You can use it as a social image (og-image) though.


Have fun! 🤟🏼
